__MSG_More_than_max_chapters_selected__.description: Error message when fetch of an image file fails.

__MSG_option_ID_Theme_OS_Selection__.description: GUI will use OS's selection of light or dark mode.

__MSG_Searching_For_URLs_Please_Wait__.description: Message shown while looking for list of Chapter URLs.

__MSG_Shift_Click__.description: Tell user how to shift-click to multiselect.

chapterPlaceholderMessage.message:
This is a placeholder.  Attempt to fetch chapter from '$url$' failed with error: 
 $error$
chapterPlaceholderMessage.description: Warning message when try to fetch an image and instead get HTML

convertToXhtmlWarning.message:
Warning, unable to convert chapter '$chapter$' from '$url$' to valid XHTML. Your epub viewer may fail when viewing that chapter. You may need to fix the chapter manually with Calibre. 
Conversion error message was: ($error$)
convertToXhtmlWarning.description: Warning message when try to fetch an image and instead get HTML

defaultAuthor.description: Default author value to use when one is not supplied

defaultTitle.description: Default UUID value to use when one is not supplied

defaultUUID.description: Default UUID value to use when one is not supplied

errorEditMetadata.message: An error occurd during the editing of the Metadata. Couldn't find the string to replace in  OEBPS/content.opf
errorEditMetadata.description: Error message when regex can't find the string to replace in OEBPS/content.opf

errorAddToLibraryLibraryAddPageWithChapt.message: "Add to Library" doesn't work with Advanced Option "Add Page with Chapters to Chapters List" enabled.
errorAddToLibraryLibraryAddPageWithChapt.description: Error message when user tries to Add to Library if Add Page with Chapters to Chapters List is enabled

errorContentNotFound.message: Could not find content element for web page '$url$'.
errorContentNotFound.description: Warning message when can't find content element for a web page

errorIllegalFileName.message: Filename '$filename$' must not contain the following characters: $illegalCharacters$
errorIllegalFileName.description: Warning message when filename isn't legal

gotHtmlExpectedImageWarning.message: Attempt to fetch high resolution version of image from '$url$' failed.  Using lower resolution image instead.
gotHtmlExpectedImageWarning.description: Warning message when try to fetch an image and instead get HTML

httpFetchCanRetry.message: This is an intermittent error. If you retry in a few minutes, it may succeed.
httpFetchCanRetry.description: Added message that retrying HTTP operation may succeed.

htmlFetchFailed.message: Fetch of URL '$url$' failed with network error $err$.
htmlFetchFailed.description: Error message when fetch of a web page fails.

imageFetchFailed.message: Fetch of image '$imageUrl$' for page '$pageUrl$' failed with network error $err$.
imageFetchFailed.description: Error message when fetch of an image file fails.

imgurFetchFailed.message: Warning: Attempt to fetch imgur image(s) '$imageUrl$' for page '$pageUrl$' failed with network error $err$.
imgurFetchFailed.description: Error message when fetch of an image file fails.

noChaptersFound.message: No chapters found. This may not be the novel's detail page.
noChaptersFound.description: Warning message when parser can't find list of chapters.

informationPageTitle.description: Title of page that gives information on epub.

noChaptersFoundAndFetchClicked.description: Warning message.  Developer has clicked 'Fetch Chapters' when there are none.

noImagesFound.description: Warning message.  Developer has clicked 'Fetch Images' when there are none.

noImagesFoundLabel.description: Text put in images table when no images are found.

noParserFound.message: No parser found for this URL.  Default parser will be used.  You will need to specify how to obtain content for each chapter.
noParserFound.description: Warning message when can't figure out how to extract info from web page.

parserDisabledNotification.message: Support for this site has been disabled at the request of site owners.
parserDisabledNotification.description: Warning message when user tries to process disabled parser.

setCover.description: Label for checkboxes used to select the cover image.

tableOfContentsUrl.description: Label on information page for URL where Table of Contents came from.

warning429ErrorResponse.message: WARNING: Site '$host$' has requested WebToEpub to slow down rate of chapter requests.  WebToEpub will wait until site allows requesting chapters again.  However, if this does not work, you may need to adjust manually.  Under 'Advanced Options' -> lower 'Max web pages to fetch simultaneously' and/or increase 'Manual Throttle|Delay per chapter'
warning429ErrorResponse.description: Warning message for user when site sends a 429 response.

warningParserDisabledComradeMao.message: WARNING: Support for comrademao.com has been disabled at the request of site owners, due to WebToEpub causing problems for other users of site.  For more details, see: https://github.com/dteviot/WebToEpub/issues/279
warningParserDisabledComradeMao.description: Warning message when user tries to process comrademao.com.

warningNoChapterUrl.message: ERROR: No Chapter URL supplied to test against.
warningNoChapterUrl.description: Warning message when user tries to test the Default Parser without supplying a Chapter URL to test against.

warningNoVisibleContent.message: Warning, content element for web page '$url$' has no visible content.
warningNoVisibleContent.description: Warning message when content element for a page has nothing viewable

warningWebpImage.message: Warning: image file '$filename$' is in webp format.  Your epub viewer may not be able to render it.
warningWebpImage.description: Warning message when downloaded image is in webp format
